function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"High temperature incineration can release air pollutants and greenhouse gases","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper handling of explosive and radioactive waste in incineration can lead to safety hazards","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper waste preparation and incineration processes can result in incomplete destruction of pathogens","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate disinfection with uvc due to inadequate depth of penetration","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inappropriate selection of disinfection technologies for hospital waste","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential risks of ozone disinfection in wastewater treatment, including high operation costs and hazardous byproducts with chemical reactions. ozone over-dose can cause bad smell and secondary pollution.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Potential risks of using uv light in disinfection, including human exposure to hazardous uv radiation and incomplete disinfection of wastewater.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sodium hypochlorite disinfectant preparation may result in high energy consumption","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Sodium hypochlorite disinfectant has strong corrosiveness","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sodium hypochlorite disinfectant poses a risk of higher pollution","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Chlorine leakage due to improper handling or storage","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficiency or ineffectiveness of chlorine risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of chlorine in wastewater treatment system","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper handling of chlorine disinfection risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure to untreated hospital wastes and wastewater","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of systematic studies on disinfection risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate representation of covid-19 topics in the kg","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited engagement and utilization of risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of overburdening the sparql endpoint and graph database, leading to performance issues and slow response times.","category":"Technological
